Title: Provides that certain communications between a claimant's attorney or representative and an injured employee's treating provider or a claimant's medical consultant are not improper influence
Summary: Provides that certain communications between a claimant's attorney or representative and an injured employee's treating provider or a claimant's medical consultant are not improper influence or an attempt to improperly influence.
LawCode: Amd ยง13-a, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to communications between a claimant's attorney or representative and an injured employee's treating provider or a claimant's medical consultant
